recipe.title: Grain and Nut Free Sandwich Bread
recipe.step: Preheat oven to 180C. Grease and line a bread tin and set aside. In one bowl add all dry ingredients. In a blender or use a hand mixer beat egg white until soft peaks form. In a separate bowl add the yolks, Greek yogurt and cooled butter and stir well. Add this to the dry ingredients and stir until combined. Fold through 1/3 of the whites until combined. Add the next third and do the same and lastly add the last 1/3 and fold until incorporated. Pour into prepared pan and smooth the top with the back of a spoon. Sprinkle over sesame seeds if desired. Place In middle rack of the oven and cook for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown. Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing. Slice and serve.
